main event: A sighting of an unidentified object report from Columbus, Ohio on 17 June 1956, involving ground-radar observation.
interesting points: The object was described as pencil-like in shape and solid in color,The sighting lasted for only 4 seconds,The observer felt there was limited visibility due to overcast conditions,The number of objects observed was either 2 or 3,Details from the report mention a faint sound from the object.
